text: Sumito Yamashita (; born 1966) is a Japanese playwright and writer. He was born in Kobe. He was awarded 156th Akutagawa Prize in 2016, for the novel Shinsekai (しんせかい "New World"). ==References== Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese dramatists and playwrights Category:Winners of the Akutagawa Prize Category:People from Kobe
title: Sumito Yamashita
